body_html: This is interesting. Could we pinpoint why it's slow? Maybe we can change the existing adam C++ kernels to accept some flags to make them more general? If we knew the exact reason, maybe we could make implementation of other optimizers fast as well. For example, there is LazyAdam in tf.contrib.opt, is it slow too?
body_text: This is interesting. Could we pinpoint why it's slow? Maybe we can change the existing adam C++ kernels to accept some flags to make them more general? If we knew the exact reason, maybe we could make implementation of other optimizers fast as well. For example, there is LazyAdam in tf.contrib.opt, is it slow too?
body: This is interesting. Could we pinpoint why it's slow? Maybe we can change the existing adam C++ kernels to accept some flags to make them more general? If we knew the exact reason, maybe we could make implementation of other optimizers fast as well. For example, there is LazyAdam in tf.contrib.opt, is it slow too?
